<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: This function is also used to retrieve floating-point values,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which can be 16, 32, 64 or 128 bits long. Bitvectors can be anything</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// between 1 and 64 bits long, which is the reason we have this weird</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// guard. In the future, we need proper calls in the backend to retrieve</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// floating-points and its special values (NaN, +/-infinity, +/-zero),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then we can drop this weird condition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Sort-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smtsort/#a6ebfd558603709d6c8fb62d82889a3a6">getBitvectorSortSize</a>() &lt;= 64 ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Z3&#95;lbool res = Z3&#95;solver&#95;check(Context.Context, Solver);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (res == Z3&#95;L&#95;TRUE)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
